text:
THE FISHY PATCH:

Remember that "Duration" = Recovery NOT StartDuration.
I went through and fixed all PP damage and speed for these weapons also.
Weapons I didn't provide a patch for may still need to have their PP stats fixed.

In the future we should consider making all PP Duration Vanilla, or
all the same duration as the weapon's medium attack, since
some weapon directions currently PP too fast to hit reliably with.

---

Gestir Spear - Made Left-Right 0.55 Duration. Made Overhead 0.9 Duration. (overhead would match new MAA stab speed, perfect)

Results in a speed scaling of 0.7, 1.0, 1.65.

FISHY PATCH GESTIR SPEAR PASTEBIN: https://pastebin.com/vwcxwkBn

---

MAA Halberd - Made Left-Right DamageMultiplier 0.9 (test this isn't too much damage). Made Stab StartDuration 0.75 and Duration 0.9.

Results in a speed scaling of 1.15, 1.65, 2.1.

FISHY PATCH MAA HALBERD PASTEBIN: https://pastebin.com/V2tdRAS9

---

Berserker Bigaxe - Made Stab 0.7 StartDuration and 0.85 Duration and 1.05 DamageMultiplier. Made Overhead 0.9 StartDuration and 1.1 Duration.

Results in a speed scaling of 1.1, 1.55, 2.

FISHY PATCH BERSERKER BIGAXE PASTEBIN: https://pastebin.com/vUmya1xL

---

Archer and Skirmisher Archersword/Cutlass2 - Made Left-Right 0.3 StartDuration and 0.42 Duration. Made Overhead 0.65 Duration. Made Thrust DamageMultiplier 0.75.

Results in a speed scaling of 0.5, 0.72, 1.15

FISHY PATCH ARCHERSWORD PASTEBIN: https://pastebin.com/gTrA5vyN

FISHY PATCH SKIRMISHER CUTLASS2 PASTEBIN: https://pastebin.com/Af3tm1vU

---

Captain - NEED INFO (vanilla speed is 0.42/6 for comparison)

---

Huscarl - Swapped all Start Duration with Duration. This will give Huscarl bigger openings and make him harder to play like HK is. Startdur should never be longer than Dur.

FISHY PATCH HUSCARL PASTEBIN: https://pastebin.com/HHYK7xG1

---
